Header: Giant comes to life in puppet spectacle in north English town
Content: A larger than life puppet woke up on New Brighton beach on Friday (October 5) for the residents of the north England town of Merseyside. The puppet called “Man Giant” is part of a set of three oversized marionettes that arrived in French theatre company Royal de Luxe. Residents took photographs as the “Man Giant” creation “walked” through the town aided by puppeteers. The Royal de Luxe theatre company has been to Merseyside twice before in 2012 and 2014. Jean-Luc Courcoult, director and founder of the company has said that this will be the giant’s final visit to the city to the town.The giant’s visit will last until Sunday.
